name: Vladyslav Fokin
summary: Full Stack developer with experience in JavaScript/TypeScript, React, Next.js, and SEO.
Open to Full-Stack, Frontend, Backend developer, or intern positions, available for office, hybrid, or remote work.

experience.title: Full Stack Developer

experience.title: SEO Specialist
